verses.roman:
āste-vyaste mahāprabhura lañā bahirvāsa
jala-seka kare aṅge, vastrera vātāsa

synonyms: āste-vyaste—with great haste; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; bahirvāsa—covering cloth; jala-seka kare—sprinkle water; aṅge—on the body; vastrera vātāsa—fanning with the cloth.
translation: They hastily sprinkled water over the Lord's body. Then they took up His cloth and began to fan Him with it.
